name: Lord_Shazar

skills.name: Damnation
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Damage increases by 15% for each debuff on the target.

effects.notes: 3-hit single target. 1.3x ATK per hit base (1.63 ATK per hit fully booked with +25% damage). Total: 3.9 ATK base (4.89 ATK booked). SCALES WITH DEBUFFS: +15% damage per debuff on target (e.g., 10 debuffs = +150% damage = 9.78 ATK total booked).

skills.book_value: Medium: +25% damage. Excellent with debuff-heavy teams for scaling damage.
skills.notes: 3-hit A1 (Giant Slayer procs 3x). Damage scales with debuffs on target (+15% per debuff). EXCELLENT with debuff teams (Dec DEF, Weaken, Poison, HP Burn, etc.). Synergizes with own A3 Bomb debuffs.

skills.name: Everlasting Fury
skills.description: Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on this Champion for 2 turns. This buff cannot be removed. Places a [Block Debuffs] buff on this champion for 2 turns. Grants an Extra Turn.

effects.notes: 50% Inc ATK buff for 2 turns. CANNOT BE REMOVED (immune to buff strip). Excellent for Arena/burst damage.
Block Debuffs for 2 turns. Protects from crowd control and debuffs.
Grants Extra Turn. Chain into A3 Bomb nuke or A1 for burst damage.

skills.book_value: CRITICAL: -1 cooldown (4→3). MUST BOOK for Arena and burst cycling. Inc ATK cannot be removed = immune to buff strip.
skills.notes: SETUP SKILL: Inc ATK (cannot be removed) + Block Debuffs + Extra Turn. Chain into A3 for Inc ATK Bomb damage or A1 for debuff-scaling burst. MUST BOOK for 3-turn cooldown. EXCELLENT for Arena (buff strip immunity + extra turn combo).

skills.name: Cruel Fate
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing 2 [Bomb] debuffs that detonate after 2 turns. Decreases the detonation countdown by 1 turn if this attack is critical.

effects.notes: AoE attack. 3.2x ATK multiplier base (4.0 ATK fully booked with +25% damage).

75% base chance (100% booked) to place TWO 3.2 ATK Bombs (detonate after 2 turns). If A3 CRITS, countdown reduced by 1 turn = 1-turn detonation (detonate next enemy turn). Build 100% C.RATE for instant detonation. Each Bomb: 3.2 ATK damage on detonation (ignore DEF). TWO Bombs per enemy = 6.4 ATK total Bomb damage.

skills.book_value: CRITICAL: +25% damage, +25% Bomb chance (75%→100%), -1 cooldown (6→5). MUST BOOK for Arena and Bomb viability.
skills.notes: PRIMARY NUKE: AoE 3.2 ATK damage (4.0 booked) + TWO 3.2 ATK Bombs (100% chance when booked). If A3 CRITS: Bombs detonate in 1 turn (next enemy turn). Build 100% C.RATE for instant Bomb detonation. Total potential damage: 4.0 ATK direct + 6.4 ATK Bomb detonation = 10.4 ATK per enemy. MUST BOOK for 100% Bomb chance and 5-turn cooldown. EXCELLENT for Arena (instant Bomb detonation with crit).

skills.name: Lord of Havoc [P]
skills.description: Increases this Champion's ATK by 5% for each debuff on each enemy. Stacks up to 50%.

effects.notes: Passive ATK boost. +5% ATK per debuff on ANY enemy (stacks across all enemies, max +50% ATK total = 10 debuffs total across all enemies). Synergizes with Bomb debuffs, team debuffers, and A1 debuff scaling. EXCELLENT with debuff-heavy teams.

skills.notes: Passive ATK scaling. +5% ATK per debuff across all enemies (max +50% = 10 total debuffs). Synergizes with: own A3 Bombs (2 Bombs/enemy × 5 enemies = 10 debuffs = +50% ATK), team debuffers (Dec DEF, Weaken, Poison, HP Burn, etc.), and A1 debuff-scaling damage. EXCELLENT for debuff-heavy teams.

forms.aura: Increases Ally SPD in the Arena by 32%.
forms.comments: AoE Bomb specialist with debuff scaling. A3 'Cruel Fate' places TWO Bombs per enemy (detonate in 1 turn if crit). A2 'Everlasting Fury' grants Inc ATK (cannot be removed) + Block Debuffs + Extra Turn for burst combo. A1 'Damnation' scales with debuffs (+15% damage per debuff). Passive 'Lord of Havoc' grants +5% ATK per debuff (max +50%). EXCELLENT for Arena (9/10) with +32% SPD aura + instant Bomb detonation. Good for Demonspawn Faction Wars (8/10) and dungeons (7/10). Must book A2/A3 for 100% Bomb chance and cooldown reduction.

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: Low priority. If used: 100% C.RATE, 250%+ C.DMG, 200+ ACC for Bombs. Bombs ineffective in CB (long cooldown, low uptime). 4/10 CB rating.
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: PRIORITY: 100% C.RATE (CRITICAL for instant Bomb detonation), 300%+ C.DMG (Bomb damage scales with C.DMG), 4000+ ATK (Bomb damage), 200+ SPD (wave cycling), 200+ ACC (Bomb debuffs). Savage or Cruel sets for ignore DEF + Bomb synergy.
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: PRIORITY: 100% C.RATE (instant Bomb detonation), 300%+ C.DMG, 4000+ ATK, 250+ SPD (speed lead + speed tuning), 200+ ACC (Bombs). +32% SPD Arena aura EXCELLENT. Use A2 → A3 combo (Inc ATK + Extra Turn → Bomb nuke). Build for one-shot or Bomb detonation wipe.
stat_priority_recommendations.faction_wars: PRIORITY: 100% C.RATE (instant Bomb detonation), 300%+ C.DMG, 4000+ ATK, 200+ SPD, 200+ ACC (Bombs). A3 Bombs excellent for wave clear and boss damage. Must book A2/A3 for Bomb uptime.

recommended_gear: Savage (BEST - ignore DEF for Bomb damage)
Speed (250+ SPD for Arena speed tuning)
Lethal Damage (extreme C.DMG for Bomb damage)

masteries.general: GIANT SLAYER CRITICAL (A1 3-hit triggers 3x per cast for massive debuff-scaling damage with passive +50% ATK from Bombs). Cycle of Magic CRITICAL (reduces A2 4→3 booked, A3 6→5 booked cooldowns). Eagle Eye CRITICAL (+50 ACC for 100% Bomb land chance with booked A3). MUST BOOK A2/A3 for 100% Bomb chance and cooldown reduction (A2 4→3, A3 6→5). Build: 100% C.RATE (instant Bomb detonation if crit), 300%+ C.DMG (Bomb damage), 4000+ ATK, 250+ SPD (Arena speed aura), 200+ ACC (Bombs). Savage sets for ignore DEF Bomb damage. Focus: Arena (9/10) with +32% SPD aura + instant Bomb detonation combo. Good for Faction Wars (8/10) and dungeons (7/10) with AoE Bomb wave clear. User Priority: Advanced PVE (Priority 3) - Lord Shazar is EXCELLENT Arena speed lead + Bomb nuker. Combo: A2 (Inc ATK + Extra Turn) → A3 (Bomb nuke with crit for instant detonation). Passive stacks +50% ATK with 10 total debuffs across all enemies (2 Bombs/enemy × 5 enemies = 10 debuffs = max passive).

blessings: Brimstone (if used in HP Burn teams - unlikely)
Soul Reap (BEST - cooldown reduction on kill for Arena/Dungeons Bomb chaining)
